import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useApp } from '../context/AppContext'; import { mockStocks } from '../data/mockData'; const HomeScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user, preferences } = useApp(); const [portfolioValue, setPortfolioValue] = useState(25000); const [dailyChange, setDailyChange] = useState(1250); const quickActions = [ { title: 'Swipe Stocks', icon: '💫', action: () => navigate('/swipe') }, { title: 'View Portfolio', icon: '📊', action: () => navigate('/portfolio') }, { title: 'Market News', icon: '📰', action: () => navigate('/news') }, { title: 'Community', icon: '💬', action: () => navigate('/forum') }, ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back!

Ready to make some moves?

{/* Portfolio Summary */}

Portfolio Summary

${portfolioValue.toLocaleString()}

= 0 ? 'text-green-400' : 'text-red-400'}`}> {dailyChange >= 0 ? '+' : ''}${dailyChange.toLocaleString()} today

Total Return

+12.5%

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
{/* Trending Stocks */}

Trending Stocks

{mockStocks.slice(0, 5).map((stock) => (
navigate(`/stock/${stock.symbol}`)} >
{stock.symbol[0]}

{stock.symbol}

{stock.name}

${stock.price}

= 0 ? 'text-green-400' : 'text-red-400'}`}> {stock.change >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{stock.change}%

))}
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
); }; export default HomeScreen;
